verbs.description: While hopes for an easing of tensions on the Korean peninsula [V: have] jumped after conciliatory gestures from U.S. President Donald Trump , the North ’s Kim Jong Un and the South ’s Moon Jae - in , the notion of unifying the Asian nation looks as distant as ever .

While [ARG1: hopes for an easing of tensions on the Korean peninsula] have [V: jumped] [ARGM-TMP: after conciliatory gestures from U.S. President Donald Trump , the North ’s Kim Jong Un and the South ’s Moon Jae - in] , the notion of unifying the Asian nation looks as distant as ever .

While hopes for an easing of tensions on the Korean peninsula have jumped after conciliatory gestures from U.S. President Donald Trump , the North ’s Kim Jong Un and the South ’s Moon Jae - in , the notion of [V: unifying] [ARG1: the Asian nation] looks as distant as ever .

[ARGM-ADV: While hopes for an easing of tensions on the Korean peninsula have jumped after conciliatory gestures from U.S. President Donald Trump , the North ’s Kim Jong Un and the South ’s Moon Jae - in] , [ARG0: the notion of unifying the Asian nation] [V: looks] [ARG1: as distant as ever] .
